assessmentInfo.title: Cybersecurity Compliance Readiness Assessment
assessmentInfo.description: This comprehensive 28-point assessment evaluates organizational readiness for cybersecurity compliance across seven critical domains including organizational foundation, security policies, technical controls, risk management, data protection, business continuity, and vendor management to ensure regulatory compliance and security maturity.

recommendations.remediation: Deploy DLP solution, configure data classification and detection rules, implement monitoring across endpoints and networks, and establish incident response for DLP events.
Deploy SIEM solution, configure comprehensive log collection, establish monitoring rules and alerting, and implement automated incident detection.
Conduct industry standards mapping, engage compliance consultants, and implement sector-specific frameworks like HIPAA for healthcare or PCI DSS for payment processing.
Conduct business impact analysis, classify services by criticality, and align cybersecurity controls to service classification levels.
Implement data classification policy, conduct data inventory, and establish handling procedures based on sensitivity levels.
Deploy security awareness platform, conduct regular training sessions, implement phishing simulations, and track training effectiveness metrics.
Implement automated asset discovery tools, deploy RMM solutions, establish asset lifecycle management processes, and maintain accurate CMDB.
Establish asset disposal policy, implement secure data wiping procedures, use certified disposal services, and maintain disposal documentation.
Create network diagrams, implement network monitoring, deploy IDS/IPS systems, establish network segmentation, and enable comprehensive logging.
Deploy enterprise firewall solution, implement deny-by-default rules, establish regular rule reviews, and enable comprehensive logging and monitoring.
Establish risk assessment policy, conduct regular risk assessments, implement risk treatment plans, and maintain risk register with regular updates.
Deploy automated vulnerability scanning tools, establish scanning schedules, implement vulnerability classification and prioritization, and track remediation progress.
Establish patch management policy, deploy automated patch management tools, implement testing procedures, and maintain patch deployment schedules.
Deploy centralized identity management system, implement role-based access control, establish access provisioning and deprovisioning procedures, and enable comprehensive access logging.

recommendations.issue: Strong password policy and multi-factor authentication
recommendations.remediation: Establish comprehensive password policy, deploy password management solution, implement MFA for all users, and enforce strong authentication for privileged accounts.

nextSteps.description: Create detailed action plan with timelines and resource allocation
Plan reassessment in 3-6 months to measure progress
Establish ongoing compliance monitoring and improvement processes
